title: New Venture Development
description: A hands-on practicum that aims to equip students with the training and knowledge to assess the viability of a venture idea or early-stage venture. Student teams will specifically support the potential or in-progress commercialization of innovation(s) discovered by a UC San Diego or external innovator. Includes methods for conducting customer discovery and business case development, hypothesis-driven lean business model development, and market, financial, and risk evaluation. Prerequisites: MBA student or by instructor approval or by department approval.
